text: Ezɨ dughiar mamɨn Jabes kamaghɨn Israelian Godɨn dɨa ghaze, “O God, kɨ kamaghsua, nɨ deravɨra na damuva nguazir avɨriba na danɨngtɨ, da nguazir kɨ datɨrɨghɨn itim gafiragham. Eghtɨ nɨn gavgavim na ko ikɨva nan akurvagh! Egh nɨ bar deravɨra na geghuvtɨ, arazir kuraba mɨzaziba na danɨngan kogham.” Ezɨ God Jabesɨn azangsɨzim baregha Jabes an azarazɨ moghɨram ami.
